transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Ha, haji sir very good morning. Mai Suryansh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se sir.

Customer: Boliye.

Executive: Sir actually kal team ka call aaya hua aapke paas mein right aur maine bhi ek aapko message share kiya tha whatsapp mein. To ye step sir aapko samajh mein aa gaya ya mai aapko guide kar du sir video meeting mein kaise process karna hai aapko?

Customer: Video meeting mein samajh.

Executive: Kya keh rahe hai sir?

Customer: Please ye remotely access karke kar dijiye isko.

Executive: Remotely system update kar de aap ye keh rahe hai?

Customer: Ha remotely aap mai aapko access de deta hu aap kar dijiye karke bol raha hu.

Executive: Sir actually access hum client ka le nahi sakte sir. Ye restrict to the policy hai sir. Mai aapko guide kar de raha hu ki kaise aapko karna hai to aap jis time pe bhi free ho to ek video meeting hum log kar sakte hai sir. Mai aapko guide kar dunga uske regarding hum log. Abhi kar dijiye.

Customer: Abhi kar dijiye.

Executive: Okay okay. To maine na sir aapko ek video meeting link share ki hai aapke register mail id pe ek baar aap check kijiyega.

Customer: Kab kiye hai?

Executive: Ek minute sir.



Executive: Sir just abhi kiya hai maine aapko dekhiye aapke paas mein aaya hoga link.

Customer: Nahi hai.



Customer: Kya hua?

Executive: Invitation with IndiaMART team Suryansh ke naam se mila hai wo sir aapko.

Customer: Right. Awaaz aapko meri clear aa rahi hai koi issue to nahi hai sir?

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Sir meri voice clear aa rahi hai koi issue to nahi hai aapko?

Customer: Hello. Sir voice clear aa rahi hai aapko meri?

Customer: Ha aa rahi hai bataiye kya karna hai.

Executive: Okay. Sir waha pe na sir share screen ka ek option aapko dikh raha hoga niche dekhiyega tab box bana hoga. Box mein ek arrow bana hoga sir.

Executive: Share screen ka.

Executive: Exactly. IndiaMART application sir apna open kijiyega.

Executive: Sabse pehle to apna chrome open kijiyega ek baar.

Customer: Mere paas chrome nahi hai bhai.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: Bataiye.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Ha ji ha ji ha ji sir. Ha kya karu bataiye.

Executive: Sir actually wo jo application hai wo chrome mein hi run karega usme guideline bhi di hui hai chrome ki. Aapko chrome chrome install karna padega sir.





Customer: Thik hai mai karke call karta hu ek.

Executive: Ha ji aap chrome download karke sir mujhe please call kijiye.

Customer: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants executive to remotely access system.

- Customer does not have Chrome installed.



Resolution:

- Executive said remote access is against policy.

- Executive sent video meeting link to customer.

- Executive guided customer to install Chrome.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will install Chrome and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- remote access, chrome, video meeting
